front.title: Specifying a Circular Uncertainty Area Using DHCP

abstract.t: This document specifies how a circular area representing the location of device can be returned using DHCP. The document also shows how the data returned from DHCP can be encoded into GML for using in a PIDF-LO in an unambiguous or contentious manner. This document is a contribution to the ongoing discussion on RFC 3825; it represents one possible solution to address the discussed issues.
